name: Aria and the Crystal Kingdom
description:
Wield cards in puzzle combat and explore a 100-floor roguelite dungeon in this cute but challenging deck-building RPG! Play as Aria as you traverse a hand-drawn fantasy world, facing off against foes in strategic turn-based combat as you search for your missing sister. Uncover the secret behind the mysterious dark crystals, but beware...the divide between good and evil is not always crystal clear.

Card-battler combat

Face down a variety of enemies, each with their own unique behaviors!

Survive a 100-floor roguelite dungeon

Each room is procedurally generated and changes with every visit!

Customize your experience

Build your deck, upgrade your favorite cards, change your class, increase your stats, and equip accessories to craft your own unique playstyle!
